name: Judgement Silversword: Rebirth Edition
description:
'Judgement Silversword: Rebirth Edition' is a Japanese space shooter video game for the WonderSwan Color handheld console. It was published by M-Kai on February 2nd, 2004.

In your space fighter, the S-AIXAK, you'll be going up against the minions of the Judgement Silversword. Starting from a small space station above the earth your lone fighter will travail the bullet filled cosmos, always a shot away from death, to achieve this goal. Judgement Silversword is a vertically scrolling shooter in which wave upon wave of multifarious of opposing craft will try to take you down with bullets, bombs, lasers, or even their own fuselages.

The game has thirty different areas each comprised of about ten sub areas. Scores are awarded based on kill ratio and completion time. New modes and easter eggs will be unlocked as you obtain higher scores.
